item.title: Jenny add a quote by William Goldman
Jenny add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Jenny add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "There are books of which the backs and covers are by far the best parts." -- Charles Dickens

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I have heard there are troubles of more than one kind. Some come from ahead and some come from behind. But I've bought a big bat. I'm all ready you see. Now my troubles are going to have troubles with me!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Robert Bloch
item.description: "Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk." -- Robert Bloch

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Peter S. Beagle
item.description: "The magician stood erect, menacing the attackers with demons, metamorphoses, paralyzing ailments, and secret judo holds. Molly picked up a rock." -- Peter S. Beagle

item.title: Jenny add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If I have to spend time in purgatory before going to one place or the other, I guess I'll be all right as long as there's a lending library." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Thomas Harris
item.description: "When the Fox hears the Rabbit scream he comes a-runnin', but not to help." -- Thomas Harris

item.title: Jenny add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It's lucky it's dark. I haven't blushed so much since Madam Pomfrey told me she liked my new earmuffs." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Jenny add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Snape raised his wand and pointed it directly at Dumbledore. "<i>Avada Kedavra!</i>" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Jenny add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Hide them all, then. Keep her – them – safe. Please.' And what will you give me in return, Severus?' In – in return? Anything." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "These woods are lovely, dark and deep, But I have promises to keep, And miles to go before I sleep, And miles to go before I sleep." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Nature's first green is gold, Her hardest hue to hold. Her early leaf's a flower; But only so an hour. Then leaf subsides to leaf. So Eden sank to grief, So dawn goes down to day. Nothing gold can stay." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I did not attend his funeral, but I sent a nice letter saying I approved of it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Conan O'Brien
item.description: "Applaud my idiocy." -- Conan O'Brien

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Conan O'Brien
item.description: "If you work really hard, and you're kind, amazing things will happen." -- Conan O'Brien

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Good books don't give up all their secrets at once." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Both Rowling and Meyer, they’re speaking directly to young people. … The real difference is that Jo Rowling is a terrific writer and Stephenie Meyer can’t write worth a darn. She’s not very good." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Arthur Conan Doyle
item.description: "When you have eliminated all which is impossible, then whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth." -- Arthur Conan Doyle

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle
item.description: "The game is afoot." -- Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

item.title: Jenny add a quote by John Waters
item.description: "If you go home with somebody, and they don't have books, don't fuck 'em!" -- John Waters

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Mel Brooks
item.description: "I've been accused of vulgarity. I say that's bullshit." -- Mel Brooks

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Jon Stewart
item.description: "Religion. It's given people hope in a world torn apart by religion." -- Jon Stewart
